dict.string: Increases the chance of finding a health globe by 25% and you gain 100% additional health from health globes.
Critical hit chance increased by 5%. Critical hit damage increased by 50%. Many skills and runestone effects rely on critical hits to trigger their effects.
Your Defense is increased by 25% of your Vitality.

Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon:
Swords/Daggers: 10% increased damage Maces/Axes: 5% chance to critical hit Polearms/Spears: 10% attack speed Mighty Weapons: 1 Fury per hit
The duration of your shouts is doubled. While benefiting from your War Cry or Battle Rage you regenerate 2% of your maximum Life per second. Your shouts are: Battle Rage Threatning Shout War Cry
You inflict an additional 20% damage while at maximum Fury.
Gain 3% of all damage done as Life.
Increases Fury generation by 10% and maximum Fury is increased by 20. Fury is used to fuel your most powerful attacks.
Reduces all non-physical damage by 20%. Whenever you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack you gain 3 Fury.
Increases armor by 100%. Thorns damage dealt increased by 100%.

Increases the damage of Ancient Spear and Weapon Throw by 15%. In addition, when you critical hit with Ancient Spear automatically resets the cooldown and on a critical hit an enemy with Weapon Throw returns 20 Fury.
While below 20% Life, all skills cost no Fury and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.
As long as there are 5 enemies within 8 yards, all of your damage is increased by 30%.
The duration of control impairing effects on you are reduced by 20%. In addition, whenever you become stunned, feared or charmed you recover 15% of your maximum Life.
The cooldown on your Earthquake, Call of the Ancients and Wrath of the Berserker skills is reduced by 30 seconds.
You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you gain 1 Fury every 2 seconds.
Cause a shockwave that inflicts 25% weapon damage to enemies in a 26 yard line behind the targeted enemy.
Add 2 reverberations that cause 16% weapon damage per strike.
Each attack grants a 10% damage boost for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
Gives each hit a 20% chance to stun the target for 2.8 seconds.
Brutally smash an enemy for 145% weapon damage with a 20% chance to knock the enemy back.
Whenever you kill an enemy with Hammer of the Ancients every other nearby enemy has a 50% chance to be stunned for 3 seconds.
Strike a smaller area for 236% weapon damage.
Critical hits have a 18% chance to cause enemies to drop treasure or health globes.
Modifies the strike to create a shockwave that deals 210% weapon damage to all enemies within 22 yards in front of you.
Create a tremor at the point of impact that slows the movement speed of enemies by 40% and deals an additional 56% weapon damage over 2 seconds.
Call forth a massive hammer to smash enemies directly in front of you for 180% weapon damage. Hammer of the Ancients has a 15% increased chance to critical hit.
Enemies are severely demoralized. Each enemy has a 19% chance to flee for 2 - 6 seconds.
Affected enemies are also taunted to attack you for 6 seconds.
Affected enemies also have their attack speed reduced by 40%.
Affected enemies also have their movement speed reduced by 56%.
Enemies are badly shaken and have a 16% chance to drop additional treasure.
Shout with great ferocity, reducing damage done by enemies within 25 yards by 50% for 15 seconds.
While under the effects of Battle Rage, critical hits cause an explosion of blood dealing 21% of the damage done to all other nearby enemies.
Critical hits increase the duration of the Battle Rage effect by 2.5 seconds.
Critical hits have a 27% chance to cause enemies to drop additional health globes. This effect cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
Enter a rage which increases damage by 20% and critical hit chance by 4% for 30 seconds.
Enemies slain by this attack have a 70% chance to explode, causing 39% weapon damage to all other enemies within 13 yards.
Increases damage to 157% weapon damage to the targeted enemy and 118% weapon damage to others in the arc.
Generate 1 Fury per enemy hit, up to 4 additional Fury total.
Draw enemies in from 20 yards away before the strike lands.
On critical hits, knock enemies back 16 yards and inflict 100% weapon damage to enemies where they land. Enemies knock each other back up to 5 times.
Swing in a wide arc to deal 120% weapon damage to the targeted enemy and 90% weapon damage to any other enemies caught in the swing.
While Ignore Pain is active, gain 21% of all damage dealt as Life.
Reflects 50% of ignored damage back at the enemy.
When activated, knock back all enemies within 8 yards and deal 50% weapon damage to them. Also reduces cooldown time to 40 seconds.
Extend the effect to nearby allies, reducing damage taken by 65% for 3.5 seconds.
Reduces all damage taken by 65% for 5 seconds.
Land with such force that enemies suffer a 70% chance to become stunned for 3 seconds.
Shockwaves burst forth from the ground at the destination and knock enemies toward you from 33.8 yards away.
Gain 400% additional armor for 4 seconds after landing.
Send enemies hurtling 6 yards into other nearby enemies who suffer 31% weapon damage and are pushed back in a chain up to 2 times.
Jump into the air with such great force that enemies within 7.5 yards of the origin of the jump take 183% weapon damage.
Leap into the air, dealing 70% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards of your destination. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Aim for the head, gaining a 40% chance of causing your target to be confused and attack other enemies for 6 seconds.
Increase thrown weapon damage to 236% weapon damage.
Expend all remaining Fury to throw a fallen foe which inflicts an additional 6% weapon damage for each point of Fury expended to all enemies within 16 yards of the target.
Angle the weapon to ricochet and hit up to 5 targets within 20 yards of each other.
Hurl a hammer with a 55% chance to stun the target for 2.2 seconds.
Hurl a throwing weapon at an enemy for 180% weapon damage and slow the movement of the enemy by 70% for 4 seconds.
Enemies in the area have their movement speed slowed by 50% for 6 seconds after they recover from being stunned.
Increase Fury gained to 31 Fury per stomp.
Increase the area of effect to 24 yards. Enemies are pulled closer before the strike lands.
Enemies are knocked back 12 yards and inflict 157% weapon damage where they land.
Shake the ground to inflict 70% weapon damage to all enemies within 12 yards and stun them for 3 seconds. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Enemies killed while bleeding cause all enemies within 10 yards to begin bleeding for 52% weapon damage as Physical.
Increases damage to 92% weapon damage as Physical every second for 3 seconds.
Gain 6% of the damage done by Rend as Life.
Increases the range to hit all enemies within 14 yards, dealing 73% weapon damage as Physical every second for 3 seconds.
Perform a bleeding strike to all enemies within 9 yards, dealing 70% weapon damage as Physical every second for 3 seconds.
Killing a creature with Frenzy heals you for 13% of your maximum Life over 6 seconds.
Each Frenzy effect also increases your damage by 16%.
Adds a 22% chance to call down a bolt of lightning from above, stunning your target for 3 seconds.
Each strike has a 40% chance to throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy that deals 100% weapon damage to all enemies in its path.
While under the effects of Frenzy you gain 16% increased movement speed.
Swing for 100% weapon damage. Each swing increases attack speed of Frenzy by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times for a total bonus of 75% attack speed.
After using Revenge, your critical strike chance is increased by 21% for 10 seconds.
Gain 4 Fury each time Revenge is used and improve Life gained from each enemy hit to 7.5%.
Increases the chance Revenge will become active for use to 127% each time you are hit by an attack.
Knocks enemies back 22 yards whenever Revenge is used.
Inflict 150% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards and gain 5.0% Life for each enemy hit. Revenge has a 15% chance to become active for a short time each time you are hit by an attack.
Increases maximum Life by 16% and regenerates 122 Life per second while affected by War Cry.
Increases the Fury generated to 42 when used.
War Cry also grants 21% dodge bonus.
All of your resistances are increased by 50% while affected by War Cry.
Unleash a rallying cry to increase the armor of you and all allies within 30 yards by 100% for 60 seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by 1 second for every target hit. This effect can reduce the cooldown by up to 5 seconds.
Increase damage at the destination to 236% weapon damage.
Generate 5 Fury for each target hit while charging.
Regain 5.5% of your maximum Life for each target hit by Furious Charge.
Any targets who are critically hit by Furious Charge will be stunned for 3.5 seconds.
Rush forward knocking back enemies and inflicting 100% weapon damage to enemies at the destination and 60% damage to enemies along the path of the charge. Only generates Fury if you hit an enemy.
Reflect 30% of incoming melee damage for 11 seconds after Overpower is activated.
Whenever used, your chance to critical hit is increased by 16% for 4.5 seconds.
Overpower generates 4 Fury for every enemy hit.
Throw up to 6 axes at nearby enemies which inflict 79% weapon damage each.
Heal 8% of your maximum Life for every enemy hit.
Deal 150% weapon damage to all targets within 9 yards. If Overpower critical hits, the cooldown on it is automatically reset.
Focus the seismic shockwaves along a narrow path to inflict 362% weapon damage to targets along a 42 yard path.
Increase damage to 301% weapon damage and increases the knockback by 150%.
The ground continues to shudder after the intitial strike, damaging enemies in the area for 31% weapon damage.
Adds a 70% chance of stunning enemies for 3 seconds.
Slam the ground to cause a wave of destruction that deals 230% weapon damage and knockback to targets in a 45 yard arc.
Project secondary tremors up to 12 yards ahead of you that inflict 66% weapon damage as Fire.
Secondary tremors knock enemies back and inflict 66% weapon damage as Fire.
Reduce Fury cost to 30 Fury and the cooldown to 85 seconds.
Secondary tremors follow your movement and inflict 66% weapon damage as Fire.
Creates an icy patch causing Earthquake's damage to turn Cold and slow the movement of enemies by 56%.
Shake the ground violently, dealing 240% weapon damage as Fire, followed by an additional 150% weapon damage per second as Fire for 8 seconds to all enemies within 18 yards.
Enemies hit with Ancient Spear will be tossed in the opposite direction and damage is increased to 131% weapon damage.
Pierce through up to 5 enemies in a straight line and drag them all back.
Throw 5 spears. Each spear will pull back the enemy that it hits.
Gain Life equal to 175% of the damage inflicted.
Throw a spear up to 45 yards to pull an enemy back to you, slowing the target's movement by 50% and dealing 100% weapon damage.
Slams through enemies, knocking them back and inflicting 98% weapon damage.
Increases the movement speed bonus to 60% for 14 seconds.
Increase the movement speed of allies within 30 yards by 25% for 6 seconds.
Increase dodge chance by 16% while sprinting.
Tornadoes rage in the wake of the Sprint, each one inflicting 33% weapon damage.
Increase movement speed by 40% for 6 seconds.
Talic gains the ability Leap Attack which deals 270% of your weapon damage to enemies in the area of the leap.
Korlic gains the ability Furious Charge which deals 220% of your weapon damage to all enemies in a line.
The Ancients inflict 200% weapon damage with each attack and have 100% additional armor.
Madawc gains the ability Seismic Slam which deals 160% of your weapon damage to enemies in an arc.

Summon the ancient Barbarians Talic, Korlic, and Madawc to inflict 100% weapon damage with each attack as they join the battle for 15 seconds.
Talic wields a sword and shield and uses the Whirlwind skill. Korlic wields a massive polearm and uses the Cleave skill. Madawc dual-wields axes and uses the Weapon Throw skill.
Critical strikes restore 1.3% of your maximum Life.
Turns Whirlwind into a torrent of magma that inflicts 49% weapon damage as Fire every 0.40 seconds.
Reduce the cost of Whirlwind to 14.0 Fury per second.
Generate harsh tornadoes that inflict 33% weapon damage to enemies in their path.
Increase the movement speed of Whirlwind by 55%.
Deliver multiple attacks to everything in your path for 44% weapon damage every 0.40 seconds.
Killing an enemy while Wrath of the Berserker is active causes them to explode, dealing 79% weapon damage to all enemies within 15 yards.
While active your damage is also increased by 26%.
Every 26 Fury gained while Wrath of the Berserker is active adds 1 second to the duration of the effect.
Activating Wrath of the Berserker knocks back all enemies within 12 yards and deals 458% weapon damage to them.
Increase the bonus dodge chance granted to 45%.

Enter a berserker rage which raises several attributes for 15 seconds.
Critical Hit: 10% Attack Speed: 45% Dodge Chance: 20% Movement Speed: 20%
Whenever you use Vault, Smoke Screen or backflip with Evasive Fire you gain 60% movement speed for 2 seconds.
Every 10 seconds your next normal attack will immobilize your target for 3 seconds.
Your maximum Hatred is increased by 50. In addition, gain 10 Hatred and 1 Discipline whenever you are healed by a health globe.
As long as there are no enemies within 10 yards, all damage is increased by 10%.
Damage against slowed enemies increased by 20%.
Every time you critical hit, gain 1 discipline. Discipline is used to fuel many of your tactical and defensive skills.
Increases the damage of your basic attacks by 100%. Your basic attacks restore 4 Hatred.
As long as you have not taken damage in the last 5 seconds you gain 2% of your maximum Life per second.
Whenever you are at full Hatred, movement speed is increased by 10%.
Gain bonuses based on weapon held: Bow: 10% increased damage Crossbows: 100% critical damage Hand Crossbows: 5% chance to critical hit
Enemies hit by Fan of Knives, Spike Trap and Caltrops have their damage reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.
Reduces the Discipline cost of all skills by 20%. Discipline is used to fuel many of your tactical and defensive skills.
The duration of your Caltrops, Marked for Death, Spike Trap and Sentry abilities are increased by 100%.
Increases Hatred generated from Grenades by 2 and reduces the Hatred cost of Cluster Arrow by 10. Upon death, you drop a giant grenade that explodes for 450% weapon damage as Fire.
Gain a 3% chance to critical hit every second. This bonus is reset 1 second after you successfully critical hit.
Damage from rockets increased by 100%. Rockets are fired from certain socketed skill effects.
Successful crits cause a burst of bone to explode from the target dealing 39% of weapon damage to enemies in that area.
Light the arrow on fire, dealing 31% additional weapon damage as Fire damage over 5 seconds.
Increase the chance for the arrow to pierce to 46%.
If the arrow successfully pierces the first target, the arrow splits into 5 arrows.
Each consecutive pierce increases the damage of the arrow by 25%.
Fire a magically imbued arrow that seeks out targets for 90% weapon damage and has a 35% chance to pierce through targets.
Critical hits deal an additional 78% damage.
The shot will pierce through all enemies in a straight line for 270% weapon damage.
Every shot releases a shockwave of energy centered on you dealing 105% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards.
Shots knock the target back and stun them for 2.75 seconds.
Fire an explosive shell that deals an additional 92% weapon damage over 2 seconds.
Impale a target for 275% weapon damage.
Become empowered while standing in the area of effect, gaining an additional 8% chance to critical hit with all attacks.
Enemies in the area also take 52% weapon damage per second.
When the trap is sprung, all enemies in the area are immobilized for 3.5 seconds.
Lay a trap of caltrops on the ground that activates when an enemy approaches. Once sprung, the caltrops slow the movement of enemies within 12 yards by 65%. This trap lasts 6 seconds.
Increase the distance of the backflip to 27 yards.
Fire exploding bullets that also deal 40% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 5.0 yards of the primary target.
Shoot for 115% of weapon damage as Lightning. Reduces the cost of the backflip component down to 2.4 Discipline.
Fire a spread of bullets that hit up to 6 targets for 69% weapon damage each.
Shoot for 115% of weapon damage as Poison damage. Whenever a backflip is triggered, leave a poison bomb behind that explodes for 85% of weapon damage as Poison in a 15 yard radius after 0.7 seconds.
Shoot for 115% of weapon damage. If an enemy is at close range, you will also backflip away 15 yards.

Augments the bola to deal 151% weapon damage as Arcane to the target and an additional 113% weapon damage as Arcane to all other targets within 7 yards, but increases the explosion delay to 2 seconds.
Increase the explosion radius to 11 yards.
After the bola explodes, you have a 30% chance to gain 5 Discipline.
Shoot 6 bolas that deal 79% weapon damage as Poison each. The bolas no longer explode for area damage to nearby targets.
When the bola explodes, it deals 105% weapon damage as Lightning damage and has a 35% chance to stun the target for 2.2 seconds.

Shoot out an explosive bola that wraps itself around its target. After 1 second, the bola explodes dealing 105% weapon damage as Fire to the target and an additional 79% weapon damage as Fire damage to all other targets within 7 yards.
Slows the movement of affected targets by 62% for 2 seconds.
Rapidly fire grenades instead of arrows at 3 times your normal attack speed that do 42% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within a 4 yard radius.
Reduces the initial Hatred cost to 16, and ignites your arrows, causing them to deal Fire damage.
Fire Poison arrows that add an additional 55% pierce chance to the projectiles fired.
While channeling Rapid Fire launch 4 homing rockets every second that deal 35% weapon damage as Physical each to nearby targets.
Rapidly fire at 6 times your normal attack speed dealing 38% weapon damage as Physical with every shot.
All enemies within 8 yards of your destination are knocked back and stunned for 3.0 seconds.
Ignite with fire dealing 144% weapon damage to everything along your path.
After using Vault, your next Vault within 5 seconds has its Discipline cost reduced by 65%.
Increases your Vault distance to 55 yards.
As you travel, shoot arrows for 79% weapon damage at nearby targets.
Surround yourself in spinning Chakrams for 40 seconds, dealing 106% weapon damage per second as Physical to nearby enemies.
A second Chakram mirrors the first. Each Chakram deals 106% weapon damage as Physical.
The Chakram spirals out from the targeted location dealing 124% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies along the path.
The Chakram path turns into a loop, dealing 159% weapon damage as Lightning to enemies along the path.
The Chakram follows a slow curve, dealing 88% weapon damage as Poison to enemies along the path.
Fire a swirling Chakram that does 135% weapon damage as Physical to enemies along its path.
Gain 6% of the damage dealt as Life.
Increase the movement slow duration to 6 seconds.
Increases Hatred generated to 8 per shot.
Strike with electrical chains that do an additional 16% weapon damage per second as Lightning for 2 seconds.
Release a sticky adhesive that deals 100% weapon damage and entangles up to 2 enemies, slowing their movement by 70% for 2 seconds.
Fire bolts of lightning that stun enemies for 2.8 seconds when they critically hit.
Turns into a frost arrow that explodes out conal damage from the back of the first target hit for 105% of weapon damage. Affected enemies have movement speed slowed by 75% for 3.0 seconds.
Shoot tentacles that deal 92% weapon damage and return 4% of damage dealt as Life for you.
Fire a lightning arrow that electrocutes nearby enemies as it passes by for 66% of weapon damage.
Grants a 28% chance to shoot a skull that will fear affected enemies for 5 - 6 seconds.
Shoot an elemental charged arrow that deals 125% weapon damage as Fire damage to all targets it passes through.
Hurl grenades that have a 10% chance to stun enemies for 1.8 seconds.
Toss gas grenades that explode for 85% weapon damage as Poison and leaves a cloud that deals an additional 25% of weapon damage per second as Poison for 3 seconds to enemies who stand in the area.
Throw a large cluster of mini-grenades that deal 89% weapon damage as Fire over an 8 yard radius.
Throw a single large grenade that deals 144% weapon damage as Fire damage and knocks enemies back.
Throw out three grenades that explode for 85% weapon damage as Fire each.
While active, gain 4% of all damage as Life.
While active, gain 4 Hatred per second.
While active, you have a 40% increased chance to dodge incoming attacks.
Draw in the power of the shadows, increasing attack speed by 30% for 8 seconds.
Instead of throwing the knives immediately, the knives will release automatically dealing 472% weapon damage to all enemies if you are struck in the next 20 seconds.
Increase the radius to deal 531% weapon damage to all enemies within 18 yards.
Increase the slow amount to 73% for 4 seconds.
Throw long-range knives that deal 85% weapon damage to 5 additional targets.
Imbue your knives with a 20% chance to stun enemies for 2.8 seconds.
Throw knives out in a spiral around you, doing 450% weapon damage to all enemies within 10 yards of you. Your knives will also slow the movement of enemies by 65% for 4 seconds.
Summons ferrets instead of a raven. The ferrets collect gold for you and increase gold found on monsters by 25%.
Summons a spider instead of a raven. The spider's attacks also slow the movement of targets by 50% for 6 - 8 seconds.
Summons a bat instead of a raven. The bat grants you 2.5 Hatred per second.
Summon a boar instead of a raven. The boar strikes multiple enemies with every swing for 29% of your weapon damage.
Summon a powerful but temporary wolf ally rather than a long-term raven companion. The wolf will fight with you for 40 seconds and attacks enemies for 79% of your weapon damage.
Summon a raven companion. Your raven companion will periodically peck at enemies for 30% of your weapon damage as Physical.
When the trap is triggered, rather than exploding, it releases a pulse of lightning that will bounce to up to 7 enemies for 100% weapon damage as Lightning.
Increases the arming time to 1.9 seconds but increases damage to 157% weapon damage.
A single cast of Spike Trap lays all 3 traps at once and increases the damage of the traps to 111% weapon damage.
Increase the maximum number of traps that can be out simultaneously to 7.
Plant an explosive on an enemy target rather than on the ground. If the target dies within 30 seconds, the trap explodes dealing 118% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

Lay a trap that arms after 1.2 seconds and triggers when an enemy approaches. The trap does 100% weapon damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
You can have a maximum of 3 Spike Traps active at one time.
Every enemy hit grants 1 Discipline. Each volley can gain up to 6 Discipline in this way.
Increases the damage done to 183% weapon damage.
Cost reduced to 7 Hatred. Deals 140% weapon damage as Lightning.
Every time you fire, generate a shock pulse that damages all nearby enemies for 144% weapon damage as Arcane.
Every use also fires 3 rockets at nearby enemies that deal 79% weapon damage as Fire each.
Fire a massive volley of arrows dealing 140% weapon damage to all enemies in the area.
Leave behind a cloud of gas that deals 100% weapon damage per second as Physical to enemies in the area for 5 seconds.
Reduce the skill cost to 12.5 Discipline.
Increase the duration of the effect to 3.25 seconds.
While invisible you also gain 30 Hatred per second.
Vanish behind a wall of smoke, becoming momentarily invisible for 2 seconds.
and an additional 1 Hatred per shot
Throw out knives rather than arrows that do an extra 78% damage on successful critical hits.
Throw out bouncy grenades at 200% your normal attack speed that explode for 41% weapon damage to targets within 9 yards. Increases cost to 2 Hatred per shot.
Movement speed increased to 100% of normal running speed while strafing.
Increase your attack speed to 524% of your normal attack speed.
In addition to regular firing, fire off homing rockets that hit for 66% of weapon damage as Fire.
Shoot at 400% your normal attack speed at random nearby enemies while moving at 75% of normal movement speed. Every shot deals 35% weapon damage.
The turret also creates a shield that reduces damage taken by allies by 26%.
Create a tether between you and the sentry that does 85% of weapon damage every second to every enemy it touches.
Heals nearby allies for 1.3% of their maximum Life per second.
Increases duration of the turret to 36 seconds.
The turret will also fire homing rockets every 1.5 seconds aimed at random nearby targets for 52% weapon damage as Fire.
Drop a turret on the ground. The turret begins firing at nearby enemies for 40% of weapon damage. Lasts 20 seconds.
1.6% of damage done to the marked target heals the attacker.
An additional 31% of damage done to the target is also divided among all enemies within 20 yards.
Attacks you make against the Marked target generate 8 Hatred. This effect cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.
When the target is killed the ability spreads to 5 other nearby targets. This effect can chain repeatedly.
Mark an area on the ground 15 yards wide for 16 seconds. Enemies in the area take 20% additional damage.
Marks an enemy. The marked enemy will take 20% additional damage for the next 30 seconds.
Grants a 40% chance that the cooldown will not be triggered when used.
Removes cooldown. Skill now costs 26 Discipline to cast but restores all Hatred instead of all Discipline.
Also restores 70% of your Life when used.
When activated, increases your maximum Discipline by 12 for 120 seconds.
Instead of replenishing Discipline immediately, you will gain 45 Discipline over 30 seconds.
Enemies hit by grenades have a 35% chance to be stunned for 1.8 seconds.
Increases the damage of the explosion at the impact location to 350% weapon damage as Fire.
Instead of releasing grenades, the cluster releases Shadow energy that deals 157% weapon damage to nearby enemies. You will gain 42% of the damage done as Life.
Instead of releasing grenades, shoots up to 6 rockets at nearby enemies dealing 85% weapon damage as Physical each.
Launch the cluster through the air, dropping a series of bombs in a straight line that explode for 66% weapon damage as Fire each.
Fire a Cluster grenade that explodes for 200% weapon damage as Fire into a series of additional miniature bombs that explode for 100% weapon damage as Fire each.
Summon a wave of 11 Shadow Beasts to tear across the ground, knocking back enemies and dealing 249% weapon damage.
Summon 20 Shadow Beasts to drop bombs on nearby enemies, dealing 249% weapon damage each.
A group of 9 Shadow Beasts plummet from the sky at a targeted location dealing 299% weapon damage and stunning enemies for 2 seconds.
Launch a massive volley of guided arrows that rain down on enemies for the next 12 seconds for 149% weapon damage.
Summon a Shadow Beast that drops grenades from the sky for 14 seconds dealing 142% weapon damage.
Fire a massive volley of arrows around you. Arrows fall from the sky for 5 seconds dealing an average of 133% weapon damage per second.
Damage you deal reduces enemy damage by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
While dual-wielding, you gain a 10% chance to dodge incoming attacks. While using a two-handed weapon, all Spirit generation is increased by 20%.
Every point of Spirit spent heals you for 16.2 Life.
Duration of all Mantras increased by 60 seconds. While one of your Mantras is active you gain 1 Spirit every second.
Your Defense is increased by 25% of your Attack.
Increases maximum Spirit by 100. Spirit fuels your defensive and offensive abilities.
Your dodge chance is increased by an amount equal to 50% of your chance to critical hit.
While stunned, feared or charmed, all damage taken is reduced by 75%.
When receiving fatal damage, you are instead restored to 35% of maximum Life and 35% Spirit. This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 seconds.
Whenever you heal another player with an active skill, you and the other player deal 16% more damage for 10 seconds.
Your resistance to all elements is equal to your highest elemental resistance.
Each different Spirit Generator ability you use increases your damage by 8% for 3 seconds.
Each hit with Fists of Thunder increases your Dodge chance by 2.5%. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Each punch causes a shockwave that hits all enemies within 6 yards of your primary target for 31% weapon damage as Lightning damage. Also enables you to teleport a short distance during the ability's first strike.
Critical hits with this skill generate 4 Spirit.
Instead of knocking enemies back the third hit creates a chain of lightning that can jump to up to 6 other nearby targets. Each lightning strike inflicts 157% weapon damage as Lightning damage.
Your primary target is charged with static for 7 seconds. Static charged enemies take 120% weapon damage as Lightning damage when you attack other nearby enemies with Fists of Thunder.
Unleash a series of extremely fast punches that deal 100% weapon damage as Lightning damage. Every third hit deals damage to all enemies in front of you and knocks them back a short distance.
Increases the chance affected enemies will miss attacks to 50%.
For 10 seconds after using Blinding Flash, all of your attacks are infused to deal 36% additional weapon damage as Holy.
Increases the duration enemies are blinded to 9 seconds.
3 seconds after using Blinding Flash, a second flash of light will blind enemies within 20 yards for 2.5 seconds.
Blinded enemies have a 30% chance to attack each other.
Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 5 seconds. Blinded enemies have a 30% chance to miss with attacks and will not attack unless they are attacked first.

When you or an ally under the effect of Mantra of Evasion is reduced below 20% Life, a shield of protection forms around that target, reducing incoming damage by 80% for 7 seconds. Each target can be protected at most once every 120 seconds by this effect.
Successfully dodging an attack creates a burst of flame dealing 79% weapon damage as Fire damage to all nearby enemies.
Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in movement speed by 7%.
Mantra of Evasion also reduces the duration of all control impairing effects by 30%.
Mantra of Evasion also grants an increase in armor by 120%.

Recite a Mantra that grants you and all allies within 40 yards a 25% chance to dodge attacks. Lasts 60 seconds. For 3 seconds after activiation, a second effect grants an additional 25% chance to dodge attacks. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Instead of knocking enemies back, affected enemies are stunned for 2.2 seconds.
With a torrent of fire, strike all nearby enemies for 295% weapon damage as Fire damage and knock them back.
All enemies around you are knocked back 200% farther and have their movement slowed by 60% for 4 seconds.
Hurl a column of fire that pierces through enemies, causing 265% weapon damage as Fire damage to each enemy it strikes.
Smite all enemies within 5 yards of a target location for 265% weapon damage and have their movement slowed by 60% for 4 seconds.
Unleash a deadly roundhouse kick, knocking enemies back and dealing 225% weapon damage.
The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the armor of the Monk by 125% for 7 seconds.
The third strike of Deadly Reach increases the damage of all attacks by 10% for 11 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
Critical hits with this skill generate 4 Spirit.
The second and third strike of the skill have an increased area of effect. Also increases skill damage to 131% of weapon damage.
The third strike is replaced with an attack that will hit up to 6 enemies within 15 yards for 100% weapon damage as Lightning damage.
Project lines of pure force over a short distance for 100% weapon damage. Every third hit extends out 25 yards.
Enemies hit by Breath of Heaven run in fear for 2.25 seconds, and take 20% weapon damage per second as Holy while they flee.
In addition to healing, Breath of Heaven also sears enemies for 31% weapon damage as Holy.
Gain 1 additional Spirit from each combo attack for 8 seconds after using Breath of Heaven.
Increases all damage done by 20% for 8 seconds after Breath of Heaven is used.
A blast of holy energy heals you and all allies within 12 yards for 812 - 1218 Life.
Perform a flying kick that has a 50% chance to stun your target for 2.8 seconds.
Fly through the air head first, slowing the movement of all enemies along the path by 50% for 7 seconds.
The cost of Dashing Strike is reduced to 11 Spirit.
Increases movement speed by 40% for 3 seconds after using Dashing Strike to an enemy.
Receive a 21% increased chance to dodge for 9 seconds.
Dash quickly at the targeted enemy or location, dealing 160% weapon damage and rooting the target for 1 second.
If you die while the decoy is alive, you are resurrected at the decoy's location with 70% Life. The decoy no longer attracts enemies and the duration is increased to 1 seconds.
Increases damage of the explosion to 360% weapon damage as Holy.
When the decoy explodes it also heals all allies within 25 yards for 731 - 893 Life.
Spawn 3 decoys. Each decoy deals 144% weapon damage as Holy when it explodes.
Summons a stronger decoy for 1 seconds. The decoy can move and attack enemies for 84% damage per swing.
Create an illusion of pure holy energy that attracts enemies to itself and explodes after 1 seconds for 275% weapon damage as Holy.
Affected targets take 20% additional damage from all attacks for 6 seconds.
Critical hits with this skill generate 4 Spirit.
Crippling Wave's third attack range increases to 17 yards.
Enemies hit by Crippling Wave inflict 50% less damage for 6 seconds.

A series of large sweeping attacks that causes 110% weapon damage to all enemies in front of you. Every third hit damages all enemies around you and dazes them, slowing movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 35% for 4.5 seconds.
An attacker that triggers Mantra of Retribution has a 30% chance to suffer a feedback blast, dealing 70% weapon damage as Holy to itself and surrounding enemies.
Increase amount of damage reflected by the Mantra to 84%. The Mantra will now reflect ranged damage as well as melee damage.
Mantra of Retribution also restores 4 Spirit when reflecting damage done to you.
Mantra of Retribution also increases attack speed for you and all allies by 16%.
When Mantra of Retribution damages an attacker, the attacker has a 70% chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to reflect melee damage back at enemies, dealing Holy damage equal to 40% of the damage sustained. Lasts 60 seconds. For 3 seconds after activation the effect on you is increased to 80% of the damage sustained. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
When Inner Sanctuary expires it becomes Sanctified Ground for 6 seconds, slowing the movement of all enemies on it by 45%.
Enemies within the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary when it is activated take 170% weapon damage as Holy.
You and all allies regenerate 105.6 Life per second while inside the circle.
Increase the duration of Inner Sanctuary to 12 seconds.
You and all allies standing in the area of effect of Inner Sanctuary take 40% less damage from attacks.
Create a circle of protection on the ground for 8 seconds that cannot be passed by enemies.

The third strike causes the target to burn for 79% weapon damage as Fire damage every second for 3 seconds. If the target dies while burning it explodes causing all nearby enemies to burn for 39% weapon damage as Fire damage for 2 seconds. This effect can chain repeatedly.
Increases the duration of the bleed effect to 7 seconds.
If a target dies and explodes with the bleed on them, gain 4 Spirit for each enemy hit by the explosion.
The bleed effect hits up to 5 targets standing in front of you.
The first two strikes cause the enemy to take 10% additional damage for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times on each target.

The first two strikes in the attack deal 100% weapon damage. The third strike causes the target to bleed for 65% of weapon damage as Physical per second for 3 seconds. If the target dies while bleeding, it explodes and deals 30% of the target's maximum Life as Physical damage to all other enemies nearby.
Mantra of Healing also increases all resistances by 35%.
Increases the Life regeneration granted by Mantra of Healing to 162.4 Life per second.
Mantra of Healing also grants you 1.4 Spirit per second.
When Mantra of Healing is activated a temporary shield is placed on you and your allies for 10 seconds. The shield will absorb up to 25% of each person's maximum Life in damage.
Mantra of Healing also increases Vitality by 30%.

Recite a Mantra that causes you and all allies within 40 yards to gain increased Life regeneration by 81.2 Life per second. Lasts 60 seconds. For 3 seconds after activation the effect is increased to 406.1 Life per second. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Increases the potency of the hobbling effect, slowing enemy movement by 62.00%.
Affected enemies also have their damage reduced by 45% for the duration of the effect.
Reduces cost to 16 Spirit per second.
Increases the movement speed of Tempest Rush to 125% of normal.
Damage taken while running is reduced by 50%.
Run directly through your enemies, knocking them back and hobbling them, slowing their movement by 50% for 3 seconds. Also deals 170% of weapon damage per second while running.
Increases the duration of the vortex buff to 9 seconds.
Intensify the vortex, increasing the damage per stack to 26% weapon damage per second. This increases the damage with 3 stacks to 79% weapon damage per second.
As long as your vortex is at the maximum stack count, you gain 1.8 Spirit per second.

Increases the radius of the vortex to 14 yards and modifies the damage per stack to 18% weapon damage per second as Fire damage. This modifies the damage with 3 stacks to 55% weapon damage per second.

While your vortex is at the maximum stack count, every third hit spawns a lightning tornado that periodically shocks nearby enemies for 44% weapon damage as Lightning damage. Each spawned lightning tornado lasts 3 seconds.

Strike a target for 100% weapon damage. Every third hit creates a vortex of air that surrounds you. The vortex of air lasts 5 seconds and deals 20% weapon damage per second to all enemies within 10 yards. This vortex effect can stack up to 3 times for a total of 60% weapon damage per second to nearby enemies.
60% of the damage absorbed by Serenity is unleashed as an explosion when Serenity expires, dealing Holy damage to enemies within 20 yards. The damage dealt cannot exceed 100% of your maxiumum Life.
Heal yourself for 4791 - 5847 Life when Serenity is activated.
Extends the protective shield and immunity to control impairing effects to allies within 45 yards for 3 seconds.
While Serenity is active, 85% of all projectiles and melee attacks are reflected back at the attacker.
Increases the duration of Serenity to 5.0 seconds.
You are enveloped in a protective shield that intercepts all incoming damage for 3 seconds and grants immunity to all control impairing effects.
The third strike generates a wave of wind that deals 175% weapon damage as Physical to enemies directly ahead of you.
Affected targets will take an additional 31% weapon damage per second as Holy for 5 seconds. Also enables the first hit to dash a short distance.
Every activation of the skill has a 15% chance to generate 4 additional Spirit.
Increase the number of hits in the second strike from 8 to 12 hits.
Critical hits increase your attack speed by 16% and movement speed by 8%. This effect lasts for 5 seconds and can stack up to 3 times.
A rapid series of punches strikes enemies for 125% weapon damage.
Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction inflict 30% less damage.
Increases Mantra strength so that enemies take 38% additional damage.
You and your allies have a 30% chance to be healed for 244 - 325 Life when using melee attacks on an enemy under the effects of Mantra of Conviction.
Enemies affected by Mantra of Conviction take 18% weapon damage per second as Holy.
Slows the movement of enemies within 20 yards by 39%.

Recite a Mantra that causes all enemies within 20 yards of you to take 20% additional damage. Lasts 60 seconds. For 3 seconds after activation the effect is increased to 40% additional damage. This is a Mantra. You can only have one Mantra active at a time.
Each impact explodes to deal 31% weapon damage as Holy around the target.
Teleport to the target location for the strike, and damage increases to 151% weapon damage per hit.
Reduces the cooldown of this ability to 22 seconds.
Increases the number of strikes made to 11 attacks.
Enemies hit by the barrage have a 40% chance per hit to be charmed or stunned for 3 seconds.
Dash rapidly between many nearby enemies 7 times striking for 115% weapon damage with every hit.

Imbue the ally with the essence of life. When the ally dies it has a 75% chance to be reborn after 7 seconds. In addition, the physical damage of the ally's basic attack is increased to 52% of your weapon damage per swing.

Imbue the ally with the essence of fire. The ally gains the ability to fire kick for 52% weapon damage as Fire damage plus an additional 13% of your weapon damage per second as Fire for 2 seconds to all enemies in a straight line.

Imbue the ally with the essence of air. Every attack made by the ally has a 10% chance to generate 11 Spirit for you. In addition, the ally is surrounded in a torrent of wind that deals 26% of your weapon damage per second as Physical to all nearby enemies.

Imbue the ally with the essence of water. The ally gains the ability to perform a wave attack that deals 66% of your weapon damage as Physical and slows the movement of affected targets by 45% for 2 seconds.

Imbue the ally with the essence of earth. Maximum Life for you and the ally is increased by 50%. The ally also gains the ability to create a wave of earth, dealing 79% of your weapon damage as Physical to a single enemy and forcing that enemy to attack the ally for 25 seconds.
Summon an elemental ally capable of engaging enemies in combat until it is destroyed. The ally deals 40% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing.
Critical hits stun enemies for 3.5 seconds.
Increases damage of the initial impact to 196% weapon damage as Holy.
Shoot out bursts of energy in all directions that deal 144% weapon damage as Holy to nearby enemies.
Summon an ancient pillar that deals 330% weapon damage followed by an additional 432% weapon damage after 2 seconds.
Focuses the power of Light to smite all enemies in front of you for 150% weapon damage as Holy followed by an additional 330% weapon damage as Holy to all enemies in a line.
Transform your dart into a snake that has a 31% chance to clamp on to the target and stun it for 3 seconds.
Ignite the dart, allowing it to deal a full 212% weapon damage as Fire at once.
Gain 295 Mana every time a dart hits a target.
Shoot 3 darts at once that deal 59% weapon damage as Poison each.
Targets hit by a dart have their movement slowed by 60% for 4.5 seconds.
Shoot a deadly poison dart that deals 100% weapon damage as Poison and an additional 80% weapon damage as Poison over 2 seconds.
Mutate to yellow frogs that deal 177% weapon damage as Poison and confuse affected enemies for 2 seconds.
Mutate to red bullfrogs that explode for 196% weapon damage as Fire.
Hail a rain of toads down from the sky that deals 144% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies in the area for 2 seconds.
Summon a giant toad that swallows enemies whole for up to 5 seconds, digesting for 39% of your weapon damage per second as Physical. This rune adds a 5 second cooldown to the skill.
Release a handful of toads that deal 150% weapon damage as Poison to enemies they come in contact with.
Your zombie dogs gain 50% of damage dealt as Life, half of which heals you.
Light your dogs on fire allowing them to burn nearby enemies for 36% of your weapon damage per second as Fire.
Upon death, your zombie dogs have a 55% chance of leaving behind a health globe.
40% of damage taken is absorbed by your zombie dogs.
Your summoned zombie dogs gain an infectious bite that deals 10% of your weapon damage per second as Poison for 3 seconds.
Summon 3 zombie dogs from the depths to fight by your side. Each dog deals 15% of your weapon damage as Physical per hit.
Killed targets have a 50% chance to produce a health globe.
Increases the damage done to 105% weapon damage per second as Physical.
Corpses fall from the sky dealing 25% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
Hands reach out from the ground slowing enemy movement by 50% and dealing 40% weapon damage per second as Physical for 8 seconds.
Modifies the spirit to do 236% weapon damage per second as Arcane over 3.0 seconds.
The spirit returns 16% of damage done as Life for you.
The spirit returns 21 Mana per second.
If there are no targets left the spirit will linger for up to 12 seconds looking for new targets.
Slows the movement of haunted targets by 37%.
Haunt an enemy with a spirit dealing 500% weapon damage as Arcane over 15 seconds. If the target dies, the spirit will automatically haunt another nearby enemy.
Summon an explosive zombie dog that deals 147% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 9 yards.
Summons a stampede of three Zombie Bears, each dealing 55% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
If the charger kills a target, at the end of its path it will reappear as a new charger that deals 98% weapon damage as Poison. This effect can repeat up to 5 times.
Summon 5 zombie chargers that each deal 70% weapon damage as Poison.
The charger leaves behind a poisonous cloud that deals 39% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies caught in it.
Call forth a reckless, suicidal zombie that deals 140% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies in its way.
Increases the damage taken by hexed targets to 60%.
Hexed targets bleed for 31% of your weapon damage as Physical per second.
The Fetish Shaman will periodically heal friendly targets for 1137 Life.
You turn into an Angry Chicken for up to 5 seconds that can explode for 183% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
Hexed targets explode when killed dealing 157% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies within 8 yards.
Summon a Fetish Shaman for 8 seconds that will hex enemies into chickens. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions and take 20% additional damage.
Summon paralyzing spiders that have a 45% chance to slow enemies movement by 60% with every attack.
Summon fire spiders that deal 52% weapon damage as Fire.
Summon widowmaker spiders that return 71 Mana to you per hit.
Summon a mother spider that births spiderlings dealing 39% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies in the area. Lasts 16 seconds. You may only have one mother spider summoned at a time.
Summon jumping spiders that leap up to 25 yards to reach their target and attack for 42% weapon damage as Physical.
Summon 4 spiders to attack nearby enemies for 38% weapon damage as Physical.
Gain 35% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after cast.
Gain 110% additional armor for 8 seconds after casting Horrify.
Gain 325 Mana for every feared enemy.
Increases the radius of the effect to 20 yards.
Increases the duration of the fear to 9 seconds.
Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within 12 yards, causing them to run in fear for 5 seconds.
Call forth a swirl of bats to damage nearby enemies for 164% weapon damage per second as Fire. The damage of the bats increases by 5% every second, up to a maximum of 25%.
Summon fewer but larger bats that travel up to 40 yards and hit for 210% weapon damage per second as Fire.
3.5% of damage done by the bats is gained as Life.
Rapidly summon bats to seek out nearby targets for 275% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Enemies in the area are plagued. Damage is slow at first, but can increase over time to a maximum of 140% weapon damage per second as Poison.
A swarm of fiery bats burn enemies in front of you for 100% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Rather than exploding for area damage, each Firebomb can bounce up to 5 additional targets. Damage is reduced by 20% per bounce.
In addition to the base explosion, create a larger blast that deals an additional 48% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 28 yards.
Create a column of flame that spews fire at the closest enemy for 22% weapon damage as Fire. The column lasts 3 seconds.
Allows the skull to bounce up to 2 times. The first hit deals 122% weapon damage as Fire, and each bounce reduces the damage by 15%.
Leaves behind a pool of fire that deals 25% weapon damage per second as Fire for 3 seconds.
Lob an explosive skull that deals 155% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 8 yards.
Gain 6% of your maximum Life every second while Spirit Walk is active.
Enemies you walk through in spirit form take 157% weapon damage per second as Physical.
Gain 8% of your maximum Mana every second while Spirit Walk is active.
Increases the duration of Spirit Walk to 7.0 seconds.
When Spirit Walk ends, your physical form bursts for 236% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 10 yards.

Enter the spirit realm for 3 seconds. While in the spirit realm, your movement is unhindered. Your link to the spirit realm will end if you cast any spell or your physical body sustains 50% of your maximum health in damage.
Affected enemies also take 275% weapon damage as Physical.
Gain 365 Life for every affected enemy.
Gain 325 Mana for every affected enemy.
Increases duration of the effect to 50 seconds.
Reduces the movement speed of enemies by 60% for 8 seconds.
Feed on the life force of up to 5 nearby enemies within 15 yards. Gain 126 Attack for each affected enemy. This effect lasts 30 seconds.
Each sacrificed dog has a 55% chance to resurrect as a new zombie dog.
Increase all damage done by 8% for every sacrificed dog for 60 seconds.
Recover 886 Mana for each sacrificed dog.
Gain 771 Life for each sacrificed dog.
Black inky goo shoots out and slows all affected enemies by 60% for 6 seconds.
All of your zombie dogs explode, each dealing 200% of your weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
The Gargantuan gains the ability to the periodically slam enemies, dealing 205% of your weapon damage as Physical and stunning them for 3 seconds.

When the Gargantuan encounters an Elite enemy or is faced with 5 enemies nearby it enrages for 15 seconds gaining: 43% movement speed 43% attack speed 125% physical damage This effect cannot occur more than once every 120 seconds. Elite enemies include Champions, Rares, Bosses and other players.

The Gargantuan only lasts 15 seconds but is also more powerful. The Gargantuan's fists burn with fire, dealing an additional 112% of your weapon damage as Fire and knocking enemies back with every hit.
Gargantuan gains a Cleave ability allowing its attacks to hit multiple targets for 52% of your weapon damage as Physical.
The Gargantuan is surrounded in a poison cloud, dealing 30% of your weapon damage per second as Poison to nearby enemies.
Summon a large zombie follower to fight for you. The Gargantuan attacks for 30% of your weapon damage as Physical damage with every swing.
Targets killed by the Locust Swarm leave behind a disease cloud that deals 28% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies in the cloud. The cloud lasts 3 seconds.
Ignite the locusts with fire causing them to deal 79% weapon damage per second as Fire.
Gain 106 Mana for every enemy affected.
When the swarm jumps there is a 40% chance to jump to two targets instead of one.
Increase the duration of the swarm to 7 seconds.
Summon a plague of locusts to assault enemies, dealing 60% weapon damage per second as Poison for 3 seconds. The locusts will jump to additional nearby targets.
Summons a Spectre for 20 seconds that hovers over you conjuring spirit bolts at nearby enemies for 79% weapon damage as Physical.
Spirits return 6% of damage dealt as Life.
Gain 295 Mana every time a bolt hits.
Every cast launches an additional 3 spirit bolts at nearby enemies other than the targeted enemy that each deal 37% weapon damage as Physical.
Summons a Spectre for 5 seconds that deals 34% weapon damage per second as Physical to all enemies within 10 yards.
Bombard a target with a spirit bolt that deals 120% weapon damage as Physical.
Spit a cloud of acid that inflict 147% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 29% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies who remain in the area.
A corpse emerges from the ground and explodes for 213% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
Increases the duration of the acid pools to 7 seconds.
The initial splash is increased to 24 yards and deals 147% weapon damage as Poison.
The acid on the ground forms into a slime that irradiates nearby enemies for 20% weapon damage per second as Poison. The slime will survive for 12 seconds before dissipating.
Acid rains down dealing an initial 125% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 25% weapon damage per second to enemies who remain in the area.
Targets killed while confused have a 78% chance of spawning a zombie dog.
All enemies in the area take 31% additional damage.
Up to 7 monsters who aren't confused will be stunned for 4.0 seconds when the spell is first cast.
Amid the confusion a giant spirit rampages through enemies dealing 37% weapon damage per second as Physical to enemies it passes through.
Incite paranoia in enemies, causing some to fight for you for 8 seconds.
Enemies who die in the ritual area have a 60% chance to resurrect as a zombie dog.
Also increases the damage of all allies in the area by 31%.
Recover 591 Mana per second while in the ritual area.
Increases the duration of the ritual to 36 seconds.
Also heals all allies in the area for 4.5% of their maximum Life per second.
Summon a Fetish to begin a ritual dance that increases the attack, casting and movement speeds of all allies in the area by 15% for 20 seconds.
A tower of zombies falls over dealing 223% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies in the way and knocks them back.
Up to 3 zombies will emerge entirely from the ground and attack nearby enemies for 36% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing.
Zombies will slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 6 seconds.
Doubles the width of the wall. The line of zombies will attack for 42% weapon damage per second as Physical.
Zombies run out in all directions dealing 118% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
A line of zombies emerges from the ground, attacking nearby enemies for 40% weapon damage per second as Physical for 5 seconds.
Adds 2 Hunter Fetishes to the army. Hunter Fetishes shoot blowdarts at enemies dealing 40% of your weapon damage as Poison.
Each Fetish deals 288% weapon damage as Physical to any enemy near it as they appear.
Adds 2 dagger-wielders to the army and increases their damage to 32% of your weapon damage.
Adds 2 Fetish casters to the army. The casters breathe fire that deals 34% of your weapon damage as Fire in a cone in front of them.
Summon an army of Fetish creatures to fight by your side for 20 seconds. Dagger-wielding fetishes attack for 28% of your weapon damage as Physical.
Reduces all damage taken by you and your pets by 20%.
Your Plague of Toads, Corpse Spiders, Locust Swarm and Firebats abilities do 20% more damage.
Whenever an enemy dies within 12 yards there is a 5% chance that a Zombie dog will automatically emerge. The range of this effect is increased by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
Maximum Mana is increased by 20%. Regenerate 2% of your maximum Mana per second. Mana is the fuel you use to cast offensive and defensive skills.
Whenever you are healed by a health globe gain 10% of your maximum Mana and 10% Attack for 10 seconds. The Attack bonus can stack up to 5 times.
15% of Mana costs are paid with Life. In addition, you regenerate 2% of your maximum Life per second.
Whenever you deal Poison damage to an enemy, their damage is reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.
You can have 4 Zombie Dogs out at once. The health of your Zombie Dogs and Gargantuan is increased by 60%.
All of your damage is increased by 20% but your Mana costs are increased by 30%.

Reduces the cooldown of your Horrify, Spirit Walk and Soul Harvest spells by 2 seconds. In addition, the next time you receive fatal damage you automatically enter the Spirit Realm for 3 seconds and heal to 10% of your maximum Life. This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 seconds.
Whenever you cast a Physical Realm spell you have a 3% chance to summon a dagger-wielding Fetish to fight by your side for 60 seconds.

Spirit spells return 200% of their Mana cost over 10 seconds.
Spirit spells are: Haunt Horrify Mass Confusion Soul Harvest Spirit Barrage Spirit Walk
Anytime you have 4 or more skills on cooldown your mana regeneration is increased by 300%.
All your pets get 100% of the benefit of your thorns and Life regeneration items.
Reduce damage taken by 60% whenever you are below 25% of your maximum Life.
The cooldowns of your Fetish Army, Big Bad Voodoo and Hex abilities are reduced by 25%.
Missiles track the nearest target and damage is increased to 130% weapon damage as Arcane.
Damage increased to 144% weapon damage as Arcane.
Whenever Magic Missile hits a target you gain 5 Arcane Power.
Fires 5 missiles that each deal 66% weapon damage as Arcane.
Missiles have a 76% chance to pierce through their target and hit additional targets.

Launch a missile of magic energy causing 110% weapon damage as Arcane.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
If Frost Nova hits at least 5 targets, you gain 30% chance to critically hit for 12 seconds.
Enemies take 34% more damage while frozen or chilled by Frost Nova.
A frozen enemy that is killed has a 16% chance of exploding another Frost Nova dealing 32% weapon damage as Cold.
The Frost Nova no longer freezes enemies, but instead leaves behind a mist of frost for 8 seconds that deals 25% weapon damage per second as Cold to enemies standing in it.
An explosion of ice freezes nearby enemies for 3 seconds and deals 65% weapon damage as Cold.
Attacks have a 40% chance to create a Frost Nova on the attacker dealing 75% weapon damage as Cold.
Attackers take 52% weapon damage as Cold and are chilled for 4.0 seconds.
Whenever you are struck by a melee attack the bonus armor granted by Ice Armor is increased by 55% for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
Lower the temperature of the air around you. Nearby enemies are chilled, slowing their movement and attack speed for 2.2 seconds.
A whirling storm of ice builds around you that deals 42% weapon damage per second as Cold for 10 seconds after casting Ice Armor.

Surround yourself in a barrier of ice that increases armor by 50% and causes 10% weapon damage as Cold to melee attackers, chilling them for 2 seconds. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Slain enemies have a 100% chance to explode dealing 210% weapon damage as Lightning to every enemy within 10 yards.
Casts out bolts of fire that each deal 118% weapon damage as Fire.
Every target hit by a pulse restores 4 Arcane Power.
Conjure a pulse of lightning that drifts directly forward, zapping nearby enemies for 46% weapon damage per second as Lightning.
Merge the bolts in a a single giant orb that oscillates forward dealing 90% weapon damage as Lightning to everything it hits with a 70% chance to pierce through enemies.

Release a medium range pulse of 3 unpredictable charges of electricity that deal 90% weapon damage as Lightning.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
Increases the distance enemies are knocked back and stuns all affected enemies for 3.5 seconds.
Increases damage to 269% weapon damage as Physical, but reduces knockback.
Reduce casting cost to 17 Arcane Power and cooldown is reduced to 11 seconds.
Enemies hit have a 70% chance to cause a smaller Wave of Force that deals 102% weapon damage as Physical and knocks back enemies caught in its wake.
Enemies caught in the wave have a 40% chance to randomly teleport to somewhere else nearby.
Explode a wave of pure energy that repels projectiles and knocks back nearby enemies. This also slows the movement of enemies by 50% and deals 205% weapon damage as Physical.
Whenever the blades do critical damage, you are healed 4.5% of the damage caused.
Enemies hit by the blade will bleed for an additional 45% weapon damage done over 3 seconds.
Every enemy hit grants 4 Arcane Power.
Extends the blades out to reach everything within 20 yards dealing 32% weapon damage.
Hits have a 36% chance to cause knockback and slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 2 seconds.

Summon a spectral blade that strikes all enemies in your path 3 times causing 35% weapon damage with each hit.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
The orb will pierce through targets, damaging any enemy it passes through dealing 147% weapon damage as Arcane.
Increase the potency of the explosion to deal 295% weapon damage as Arcane.
Reduce casting cost to 27 Arcane Power.
Modify the orb to deal 206% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 16 yards.
Create 4 Arcane Orb(s) that orbit(s) you, exploding for 177% weapon damage as Arcane when enemies get close.
Hurl an orb of pure energy that explodes when it hits, dealing 225% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 10 yards.
Melee hits recover 3.0% of damage caused as Life.
Melee attacks burn enemies, dealing 31% of weapon damage as Fire for 3 seconds.
Melee hits restore 7% of your maximum Arcane Power.
Melee attacks cause lightning to arc to 5 nearby enemies dealing 31% of weapon damage as Lightning damage.
Increases damage bonus to 19.7% damage, and gives a 10% chance to knock back any enemies hit.
Imbue your weapon with magical energy, granting it 15% increased physical damage. Lasts 120 seconds.
Critical hits with this skill cause an explosion of 5 charged bolts in random directions, dealing 105% weapon damage as Lightning to any targets hit.
Creates a streak of lightning that pierces targets, hitting all enemies in its path for 58% weapon damage as Lightning.
Gain 4 Arcane Power for every target hit by Electrocute.
Increases the maximum number of jumps to 7 enemies.
Blast a cone of lightning that causes 52% weapon damage as Lightning to all affected targets.

Lightning arcs from your fingertips at double your normal attack speed, dealing 40% weapon damage as Lightning. The lightning can jump, hitting up to 2 enemies. Damage is reduced by 30% for each jump.
This is a Signature spell. Signature spells cost 1 less Arcane Power every time you gain a level.
When Diamond Skin wears off, diamond shards will explode in all directions dealing 419% weapon damage as Physical to enemies nearby.
Reflects 40% of damage absorbed back at the attacker.
Reduce Arcane Power cost of all spells by 12 while Diamond Skin is active.
Increase the maximum absorption amount to 4061 damage.
Transform your skin to diamond for 5 seconds, absorbing up to 2030 damage from incoming attacks.
Twister no longer travels but spins in place dealing 42.2% weapon damage per second as Arcane to everything caught within it.
Increase damage to 60% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
Reduce casting cost to 23 Arcane Power.
When two twisters touch they merge into a tornado with an increased area of effect that causes 131% weapon damage per second as Arcane.

Casting Energy Twister grants you a Wind Charge. You can store up to 3 Wind Charges at a time. Casting a Signature spell releases all Wind Charges as a giant Energy Twister that deals 360% weapon damage as Arcane per Wind Charge. Signature spells are: Magic Missile, Shock Pulse, Spectral Blade, Electrocute.
Unleash a twister of pure energy that deals 46% weapon damage per second as Arcane to everything caught within it.
Whenever you land an attack that critically hits, you also shock a nearby enemy for 117% weapon damage as Lightning.
Increase the damage of the shock to 167% weapon damage as Lightning.
Reduce the cost of all abilities by 4 Arcane Power while Storm Armor is active.
Increase your movement speed by 20% for 8 seconds whenever you are hit by melee or ranged attack.
Whenever you are hit you are enveloped with a lightning shield for 8 seconds that shocks nearby enemies for 28% weapon damage as Lightning.

Bathe yourself in electrical energy, shocking ranged and melee attackers for 127% weapon damage as Lightning. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Enemies killed by the beam have a 35% chance to explode causing 170% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 8 yards.
Damage increases slowly over time to inflict a maximum of 236% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
When casting the beam you become charged with energy that spits out at nearby enemies doing 50% weapon damage as Arcane.
Increase the width of the beam allowing it to hit more enemies for 135% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
The beam fractures into a short ranged cone causing 189% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
Thrust a beam of pure energy forward, dealing 135% weapon damage per second as Arcane and disintegrating enemies it kills.
When an image is destroyed it explodes, doing 105% weapon damage as Physical and has 50% chance to stun enemies it hits for 4 seconds.
Spells the images cast will do 25% of the damage as your own.
The duration of the images is increased to 25 seconds and increases the Life of your images to 45% of your Life.
Summons 4 illusionary duplicates that have 20% of your Life each.
Increases the Life of your images to 88% of your Life.
Summon 2 illusionary duplicates of yourself that last for 15 seconds and have 25% of your Life. The images may cast some of the same spells as you, but those spells deal no damage.
3 consecutive explosions cascade off you that each cause 65% weapon damage as Physical.
An energy explosion fires immediately for 195% weapon damage as Physical.
Reduces the casting cost to 33 Arcane Power.
Increase the explosion radius to 18 yards for 173% weapon damage as Physical.
The blast detonates from the point it was originally cast after 2.5 seconds for 205% weapon damage as Physical.
Gather an infusion of energy around you that explodes after 1.5 seconds, causing 165% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies within 12 yards.
Time is sped up for any friendly heroes standing in the bubble, increasing attack and cast speed by 0%.
Enemies caught in the bubble of warped time take 31% more damage.
Slow Time effects cling to enemies for 8 seconds after they have left the bubble.
Reduces the size of the Slow Time bubble to 10 yards, but increases the effect, slowing movement and attack speed of enemies by 52% while inside the bubble.
Invoke a bubble of warped time and space for 10 seconds, slowing the movement and attack speed of enemies by 35%. This bubble also slows the movement of enemy projectiles by 90%.
After casting Teleport there is a 1.2 second delay before the cooldown begins.
Casts a low power Wave of Force on arrival dealing 210% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies nearby.
Casting Teleport again within 5 seconds will instantly bring you back to your original location.
Summon 2 mirror images for 12 seconds on arrival.
For 10 seconds after you appear you will take 25% less damage.
Teleport through the ether to the selected location up to 35 yards away.
Summon Arcane Hydras that spit Arcane Orbs which explode on impact causing 24.6% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies near the explosion.
Summon Frost Hydras that breathe a short range cone of frost causing 28.7% weapon damage per second as Cold to all enemies in the cone.
Summon one Mammoth Hydra that breathes a wall of flame at nearby enemies dealing 16.4% weapon damage per second as Fire to enemies caught in the burning ground.
Summon Lightning Hydras that shock enemies for 36.8% weapon damage as Lightning.
Summon Poison Breathing Hydras that leave a pool of acid causing 20.5% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies who remain in the pool.
Summon a multi-headed Hydra for 9 seconds that attacks enemies with bolts of fire dealing 31.2% weapon damage as Fire per attack.
Enemies who die leave a patch of ice on the ground that causes 35% weapon damage per second as Cold to enemies moving through it.
Damage increases slowly over 1.5 seconds to inflict a maximum of 371% weapon damage per second as Cold.
Reduce casting cost to 6 Arcane Power per second.
Create a swirling storm of sleet dealing 210% weapon damage per second as Cold to all enemies caught within it.
Increase enemy slow amount to 46% for 7.0 seconds, but damage is reduced to 216% weapon damage per second as Cold.
Project a beam of frozen ice that blasts 270% weapon damage per second as Cold to the first enemy it hits, slowing the target's movement by 40% and attack speed by 30% for 5 seconds.
Also increases your Precision by 25% while Energy Armor is active.
Increases all of your resistances by 120% while Energy Armor is active.
Gain 4 Arcane Power whenever you are hit by an ranged or melee attack.
Rather than reducing your maximum Arcane Power, it is increased by 25 while Energy Armor is active.
While Energy Armor is active, incoming attacks that would deal more than 38% of your maximum Life are reduced to deal 38% of your maximum Life instead.

Focus your energies, increasing your Defense by 20% but lowers your maximum Arcane Power by 20. Lasts 120 seconds.
This is an Armor spell. Only one Armor spell can be active at a time.
Unleash the torrent beyond your control. You can no longer direct where the projectiles go but their damage is increased to 314% weapon damage per second as Arcane.
Targets hit by Arcane Torrent become Disrupted for 6 seconds, causing them to take 31% additional damage from any attacks that deal Arcane damage.
Every missile hit has a 5% chance to leave behind a Power Stone that grants Arcane Power when picked up.
Enemies killed by Arcane Torrent have a 80% chance to fire a new missile at a nearby enemy dealing 135% weapon damage as Arcane.

Instead of firing projectiles, lay Arcane mines that arm after 1 second. These mines explode when an enemy approaches, dealing 183% weapon damage as Arcane. Enemies caught in the explosion have their movement and attack speeds reduced by 30% for 3 seconds.
Hurl a barrage of arcane projectiles that deal 200% weapon damage per second as Arcane to all enemies near the impact location.
Summons a physical Familiar. While you are below 25% Life the Familiar will absorb the next attack against you. This effect can occur at most once every 33 seconds.
Summons a fiery Familiar that increase damage of all attacks by 31% while Familiar is active.
While the Familiar is active you regenerate 1.8 Arcane Power per second.
Familiar's projectiles explode on impact dealing 9.83% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 4 yards.
Summons an lighting Familiar who's projectiles have a 70% chance to pierce through enemies.
Summon a companion that will attack your targets for 15% weapon damage as Arcane. This companion cannot be targeted or damaged by enemies. Pet lasts 60 seconds.
Enemies caught in the storm have a 30% chance to be frozen for 3 seconds and the critical strike chance with Blizzard is increased by 25%.
Increase the duration of the Blizzard to 5.5 seconds.
Reduce the casting cost to 33 Arcane Power.
Increase the size of the Blizzard to cover 22 yards, and deal 60% weapon damage per second as Cold.
After the Blizzard ends, cover the ground in a low lying mist for 4.5 seconds that slows any enemies who enters it.
Call down shards of ice to pelt an area dealing 65% weapon damage per second as Cold for 3 seconds.
If the initial impact critically hits any targets, the molten fire duration is increased to 6 seconds.
Increase the damage of the meteor impact to 400% weapon damage as Fire and the molten fire to 66% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
Reduce casting cost to 48 Arcane Power.
Unleash a volley of 13 smaller meteors that each strike for 122% weapon damage as Fire.

Transforms the meteor to ice that deals 240% weapon damage as Cold. The impact site is covered in a freezing mist that deals 39% weapon damage as Cold and slows the movement of enemies by 60% over 3 seconds.

Summon an immense meteor that plummets from the sky causing 305% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies it crashes into. The ground it hits is scorched with molten fire that deals 50% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
An explosion errupts when you transform causing 524% weapon damage as Arcane to all enemies within 15 yards.
Increase damage of all Archon abilities by 31%.
Decrease the cooldown of Archon to 95 seconds.
Archon form can now cast a Slow Time that lasts for 14 seconds.
Archon form can now cast Teleport with a cooldown of 6 seconds.

Transform into a being of pure arcane energy for 15 seconds. While in Archon form your normal abilities are replaced by powerful Archon abilities, and your armor and resistances are increased by 40%. Every enemy killed while in Archon form adds 1 second to the duration of Archon.
Gain 30 Arcane Power whenever you are healed by a health globe.
Whenever you deal Arcane damage, enemies are slowed by 24% for 2 seconds.
Your critical hits reduce the cooldown of your spells by 1 second.
Increases all damage done by 20% but decreases armor and resistances by 10%.

Every time you cast a Signature spell, you gain 5 Arcane Power.
The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute
Increases the damage of your basic wand attack by 100%. Successful attacks with a wand generate 15 Arcane Power and heal you for 1% of your maximum Life.
Increases your maximum Arcane Power by 20 and Arcane Power regeneration by 2 per second.
Whenever you suffer more than 15% of your Life in a single hit the cooldown on your Mirror Image and Teleport abilities is automatically reset.
Dealing fire damage to enemies applies a burning effect, increasing all damage done to them by 15% for 3 seconds.

Increases the duration of your Armor spells by 120 seconds. As long as an Armor spell is active, you gain 122 Life per second.
The following skills are improved: Energy Armor Ice Armor Storm Armor

When you deal damage with a Signature spell you gain a Flash of Insight. After 8 Flashes of Insight, your next non-Signature spell deals 50% additional damage. You cannot gain a Flash of Insight more than once every 0.9 seconds.
The following skills are Signature spells: Magic Missile Shock Pulse Spectral Blade Electrocute
When reduced below 20% Life release a shockwave that knocks all enemies back. This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 seconds.
